name: I am grateful for you
description:
This time last year my health took a crazy spiral. After 2 major surgeries and lots of LOVE & PRAYERS, I'm back and stronger.
Being bed ridden meant I couldn't do things like move around alone and basic self-care tasks, additionally I had to become comfortable with asking for help and letting others help me.
I was reminded Humans aren't meant to be alone or isolated, and that it's our connections and sharing that empower us the most. I wrote this for the people who accompanied me on this healing journey, I could not have done it without you.
